text: An image illustrating a funny scene. A vivid green frog with its distinctive amphibious features. The frog is wearing a pair of swimming goggles that fit perfectly on its eyes. The backdrop is a realistic human-like context. Maybe the frog is reading a newspaper at a classic French cafe, perhaps stirring a cup of tea with its clumsy amphibian hands. Around it, the rush of human life proceeds unbothered. Use soft and natural colors to evoke a lighthearted atmosphere.
